channel.title: Scape-JAVA for Moparscape Global Moderator
channel.description: I know he used to be a moderator in the past, and he did a good job at it too. I know that what ever he did was just a silly mistake and I think he should at least get moderator back. He's obviously mature enough to handle the position and he is respectful too. I just think he deserves it back.

item.title: Scape-JAVA for Moparscape Global Moderator
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Not even up for consideration for a very long time and he knows why. And that decision is not up for discussion.

Read full topic
